Hyperedit won't keep planet locations because they're reset when you load back into the scene. Try putting your ship on the pad/runway, then changing the orbits and launch.

Your ship is probably blowing up because you've got Gilly inside Kerbin's sphere of influence, causing the game engine to get really confused about what to do when you get into Gilly's SoI, so the ship gets torn apart.
